titles.title: Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act
Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act
A bill to designate a Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial at the March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 113-27.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Wyden without amendment. With written report No. 113-50.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 104.

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Reported to Senate without amendment. Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act - Designates the memorial at March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California, as the Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial, in honor of current and former members of the armed forces who have been awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross. Prohibits the designation of such memorial from being construed to require or permit federal funds to be used for any related purpose.
